Text.content: There are two ways of using the image processing library in a JSP. There is a <cms:img> taglib available and a JSP bean called CmsJspImageBean. The <cms:img> tag is easy to use. When developing a new JSP though, it is recommended to use the image bean since it has more features. Especially, applying a chain of transformations to an image is more convenient with the image bean.
